Pre-Game Insights: The 76ers have gone 5-9 at home. Philadelphia is 4-12 against opponents over.500.
The Suns are 5-10 on the road. Phoenix has a 4-8 record in games decided by at least 10 points.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Tyrese Maxey is averaging 25.2 points, 5.5 assists and 2.1 steals for the 76ers.
Devin Booker is averaging 24.6 points and 6.6 assists for the Suns.
Others: The 76ers score 107.6 points per game, 6.8 fewer points than the 114.4 the Suns allow.
The Suns average 112.1 points per game, 1.3 more than the 110.8 the 76ers allow.
The 76ers have gone 7-3 in their last 10 games, averaging 113.1 points, 38.9 rebounds, 22.8 assists, 11.5 steals and 4.4 blocks per game while shooting 46.9% from the field.
Suns: 3-7, averaging 110.0 points, 41.0 rebounds, 27.3 assists, 8.0 steals and 5.9 blocks per game while shooting 46.8% from the field.
